title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: EEG (Electroencephalography) Interpretation Practical Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and classify standard brainwave patterns (alpha/beta/theta waves) with 80% accuracy
Learners can interpret and write reports by mathematically modeling EEG data based on actual clinical cases
Learners improve EEG interpretation protocols at least three times through project deliverables incorporating peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
